v0.1.0, 2013-03-18
==================

- Initial release

v0.1.1, 2013-03-18
==================

New
~~~

- Support for BMI implementations without a grid.

Fixes
~~~~~

- Fix namespace package error that caused package to not import

v0.1.2, 2013-03-26
==================

New
~~~

- More BMI examples.
- More BMI exceptions
- Check for required attributes of BMI classes (author, email, version, etc.)
